automatic_ordering.reasoning: Each session entry (AD_Combat_Sapper_003, AD_Combat_Sapper_001, and AD_Combat_Sapper_004) represents an independent combat trigger event in the game. The 'how_to_trigger' values indicate that these sessions are activated when a character takes a turn and combat starts. There is no information in the synopses or trigger instructions that implies a cause-and-effect relationship between these sessions, nor is there any indication that triggering one would preclude or necessitate the triggering of another. Therefore, there are no ordering or mutual exclusivity constraints that apply between these sessions.
